item.title: Welcome to Ghost
item.description: A few things you should know upfront: Ghost is designed for ambitious, professional publishers who want to actively build a business around their content. That's who it works best for. The entire platform can be modified and customised to suit your needs. It's very powerful, but does require some knowledge of code. Ghost is not necessarily a good platform for beginners or people who just want a simple personal blog.
